gantrytips.tip: The level of graphic intensity of the main background elements can be controlled by this Background Level slider.
The level of graphic intensity of the body background elements can be controlled by this Body Level slider.

The CSS Style setting allows you to easily change the whole look of your site. The different CSS styles are a selection of preset settings such as background colors and font settings. A little preview thumbnail can be seen by clicking the Show Presets button at the right top.

The Link Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used to highlight links. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.

This setting allows you to use 3rd party WebFonts from providers such as Google. You must first set WebFonts to show and then save your changes, then the available WebFonts will appear in the Font Settings dropdown from where they can be selected.
A selection of fonts to be applied to your site's frontend is available from the Font Settings dropdown. It is also possible to set the Font Size according to your preference.
